title: [House Brigatta, Banyan Tree]
description: It is noticeably cooler here than in the other parts of the garden.  A huge banyan tree keeps this area in a perpetual gloom.  There are various mosses clinging to the tree, and all the shrubs seem stunted.  A gardener's shed, almost hidden under a dense netting of moss and flowering vines, is nestled close to the western boundary of the garden.  Running along the side of the house is a spiral staircase leading up to the rooftop observatory, while the back porch of House Brigatta can be seen to the south.

It is noticeably cooler here than in the other parts of the garden.  A huge banyan tree keeps this area in a perpetual gloom.  There are various mosses clinging to the tree, and all the shrubs seem stunted.  A gardener's shed, almost hidden under a dense netting of moss and flowering vines, is nestled close to the western boundary of the garden.  Running along this side of the house are some doors leading into a kitchen and a spiral staircase leading up to a rooftop observatory, while a back porch can be seen to the south.
